item.description:
Meet up with The Most Informal Running Club Ever on the Boston side of the Charles River for the weekly Saturday Fun Run. We'll split up into groups depending on the turnout for distance and time goals for 3, 5 or 6 mile loops. It's your choice!

What to expect: a seriously fun group of runners who definitely do not take running too seriously. We will meet, chat, RUN, stretch, chat, EAT BREAKFAST and then leave. It's that easy.

Breakfast Details: Between 11:15 and 11:30 (depending on how long we run) we will meet at CITY SPORTS @ BU* for breakfast. If you would like to bring a breakfast item to share (eggs, bagels, fruits, muffins, juice, bacon, potatoes, etc.) please feel free to do so. You are not obligated to bring anything, though, so please join us for breakfast after the run!

ALL ABILITY LEVELS ARE WELCOME!!!

Meter parking is easily accessible on Comm Ave. and also Gardner St. which runs parallel behind the store. The B train on the Green Line stops directly across from the store at Babcock St.

* "The Rock" has moved to CITY SPORTS located at the intersection of Commonwealth Ave. and Babcock St.

informalrunning.com

Read the BLOG

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: TMIRCE Saturdays @ City Sports Informal Run + Breakfast
